text: Janusz Olejniczak (2 October 1952 – 20 October 2024) was a Polish classical pianist and actor. He began playing the piano at the age of six. He also performed the music in Roman Polanski's movie The Pianist, also appearing as the hand double for Adrien Brody, who plays pianist Władysław Szpilman. Olejniczak died of a heart attack on 20 October 2024, at the age of 72. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1952 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Polish pianists Category:Polish movie actors Category:People from Wrocław
title: Janusz Olejniczak
